roleset.name: Able to be measured

example.name: MRI is not a standard but a tool
example.text: The tumer was measurable by MRI

example.name: Rare arg 3
example.text: The surgical margin was measurable at 3 cm.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Relation to measure.01. Measure.01 is a member of VN class register-54.1-1. Framed by Katie.
